products.title: Hive Lusso Steel Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure hive lusso steel grey perfect fit pleated blind px80205. A luxurious dim-out blind, produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric.
products.productdescription: Hivelussosteel perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The hive lusso range has a  backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric.
